Articles.Content:
Sent a plane to investigate an anomaly far to the north of KSC.

![5EF20600512958DA2D60079173B61EAB60C38892](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371260970323974/5EF20600512958DA2D60079173B61EAB60C38892/)

![F757B4DE5D4B51EE3AF114B3BF190093F8FE3DDC](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371260970324341/F757B4DE5D4B51EE3AF114B3BF190093F8FE3DDC/)

Discovered an object half buried in the snow and that's when strange things began to happen.

![40C4AFB5FE60A237960522A074A879D14D979926](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371260970325443/40C4AFB5FE60A237960522A074A879D14D979926/)

![7142B374D3204482AE39147C7BE80054850BCE83](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371260970325975/7142B374D3204482AE39147C7BE80054850BCE83/)

Despite the occurrences everyone thought it would be okay to get out and take some group photos.

![9D53BC2D02106D053892812474EA99BF3EDDB2BB](http://cloud-2.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371260970326395/9D53BC2D02106D053892812474EA99BF3EDDB2BB/)

![1B84D94CF9B106000015239ED87C4BD8DE8EEDE8](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371260970326744/1B84D94CF9B106000015239ED87C4BD8DE8EEDE8/)

Kerbal high command immediately began funding a massive construction project near the sight. Testing and delivery of facilities began.

![D369B87FD05ABB467AE6BB2AA6565295526AD1F9](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371260972637844/D369B87FD05ABB467AE6BB2AA6565295526AD1F9/)

![45CFCFE4BE69DA59D857F81215F2A05E6E7F22E4](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371260972492803/45CFCFE4BE69DA59D857F81215F2A05E6E7F22E4/)

![9B3396DD882DB1010160DA055D0EBB6E4BD2B0A5](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371260974316717/9B3396DD882DB1010160DA055D0EBB6E4BD2B0A5/)

![CE0C196E141C01D89C13A0CB53B8BE269CDFED2A](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371260974312603/CE0C196E141C01D89C13A0CB53B8BE269CDFED2A/)

![F24EB8DF8A6A98DC19FD4D05DC40856615CA88A4](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371260974313217/F24EB8DF8A6A98DC19FD4D05DC40856615CA88A4/)

So after dragging the communications module into position I then pulled all my KAS enabled cranes up to the facility.

![497F8BA30ED20000758FC253519568469CEE81F7](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371260974313795/497F8BA30ED20000758FC253519568469CEE81F7/)

![F9241272391878A93FA5FBBF9099F57418BB7614](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371260975694147/F9241272391878A93FA5FBBF9099F57418BB7614/)

Only to discovery that attaching 3 vehicles to something with KAS is essentially docking and making 1 vehicle and controlling said vehicles individually is nearly impossible and it also causes major glitches. I basically broke my game. I will now be back at the drawing board for my next version of multi purpose crane instead of 3 separate ones.

 In the below pic one of the cranes started to slowly levitate and would not unplug/undock. Eventually the game would crash every time. I tried to work around this for hours then decided to revert to an earlier save. More to follow.

![628336FAB5153EC2290D7C6A65C807FF21B48987](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371260977815487/628336FAB5153EC2290D7C6A65C807FF21B48987/)

Once better equipment was developed and tested construction began to look promising.

![938C8240DAF36251F8996342E619D3B7F206036D](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371814581223422/938C8240DAF36251F8996342E619D3B7F206036D/)

![AE10EE629A77FF2AA6B090050600951D7B80EE5A](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371814581224191/AE10EE629A77FF2AA6B090050600951D7B80EE5A/)

The Polar Skidder proved itself to be a proficient base building tool.

![558E22A4227B0AF128746D4D94C64EE7C77E2031](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371814581224971/558E22A4227B0AF128746D4D94C64EE7C77E2031/)

![C6E2058057C60B73553F16CC81FB03D8CF295A77](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371814581225590/C6E2058057C60B73553F16CC81FB03D8CF295A77/)

![2234E787F520BA9F4DBA72BA77F533A92BE7D31C](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371814581226979/2234E787F520BA9F4DBA72BA77F533A92BE7D31C/)

The power and communications modules were fired up an once the reverse engineering lab and living quarters are attached science on the anomaly can begin.

![02758BBDCD21D75FF1D01B90D03299F85D68024C](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371814581228387/02758BBDCD21D75FF1D01B90D03299F85D68024C/)

![2A60158E7EDDC7A010589238AB3A336D91B37216](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/45371814581231474/2A60158E7EDDC7A010589238AB3A336D91B37216/)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-27T06:38:19Z" title="02/27/2015 06:38  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 27, 2015</time> by Bigbootie**
Good luck, but you know the evidence always disappears before you can bring it back.

> 
> Good luck, but you know the evidence always disappears before you can bring it back.

The truth is out there. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
Is that object in stock? or Kerbin side or something else? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Stock. Use SCANsat to find the exact location, or fly around the north polar area near the southern edge.
Nope, it's a stock easter egg near the north pole.
